select t1.id as id,t2.id as customerId,t1.contact_id as contactId ,t1.name as name,t2.create_time as createTime,t2.name as customerName,t3.name as userName,t1.contact_type as contactType,t1.position as position,t1.create_time as progressTime, t1.speak_time as speakTime ,t1.remarks as remarks , t1.satisfied as satisfied,t1.next_time as nextTime ,t1.appoint_user_id as appointUserId ,t1.files_id as filesId from customer_progress t1 left join customer t2 on t1.customer_id=t2.id left join users t3 on t2.user_id=t3.id where t1.id=#{id}

SELECT t1.id AS id, t1.name AS contactName,t1.contact_id as contactId, t2.name AS customerName,t3.name AS userName,t1.contact_type AS contactType,t1.create_time AS progressTime, t1.speak_time AS speakTime,t1.remarks AS remarks, t1.satisfied AS satisfied,t1.user_id AS userId,t2.group_id AS groupId,t2.customer_type AS customerType FROM customer_progress t1 LEFT JOIN customer t2 ON t1.customer_id=t2.id LEFT JOIN users t3 ON t1.user_id=t3.id where t2.status=0 and t1.customer_id=#{customerId} order by t1.create_time desc
